info.title: Orbipay REST APIs
info.description: API specification to use the Orbipay REST APIs. This documentation covers the Customer Management and Payment Management related APIs.

tags.name: Customer
tags.description: This section outlines the APIs required to exchange and manage customer information, such as customer account details.

tags.name: Bank Account
tags.description: This section outlines the APIs required to enable customers to manage their funding accounts.

tags.name: Card
tags.description: This section outlines the APIs required to enable customers to manage their cards.

tags.name: Transfer
tags.description: This section outlines the APIs required to manage Transfers.

tags.name: CashIn
tags.description: This section outlines the APIs required to manage CashIn.

tags.name: CashOut
tags.description: This section outlines the APIs required to manage Cashout.

tags.name: Transaction
tags.description: This section outlines the APIs required to manage Transaction.

tags.name: Wallet
tags.description: This section outlines the APIs required to enable customers to manage their wallet.

post.description: The Create Customer API is used to register a customer with Orbipay Wallet.

parameters.name: customer
parameters.description: This JSON contains all the attributes of customer to be created.

id.description: Unique ID assigned by the Orbipay Wallet to the customer.

first_name.description: This field contains account holder’s first name and will be sent on all types of detail records.

last_name.description: This field contains the account holder’s last name, and will appear on all types of detail records.

middle_name.description: This field contains the account holder’s middle initial and will appear on all types of detail records.

date_of_birth.description: Date of Birth.  ISO8601 full-date format, YYYY-MM-DD

government_issued_id.description: Provide SSN in case of Customers from US.

email.description: This field contains the customer’s email address within the OrbiPay System.

phone_number.description: Home phone number of the customer

social_account_id.description: id provided by the social networking sites.

register_login_id.description: Email or phone number used for login.

parameters.name: PARTNER_ID
parameters.description: Unique partner Identifier, for example  cli_example5852kw555

parameters.name: SIGNATURE_KEY
parameters.description: Signature key used for authentication  cli_example5852kw555

200.description: Response to Create Customer API is populated with the External Identifiers issued by OrbiPay-Checkout system for the customer and the account(s).

id.description: Unique ID assigned by the Orbipay Wallet to the customer.

first_name.description: This field contains account holder’s first name and will be sent on all types of detail records.

last_name.description: This field contains the account holder’s last name, and will appear on all types of detail records.

middle_name.description: This field contains the account holder’s middle initial and will appear on all types of detail records.

date_of_birth.description: Date of Birth.  ISO8601 full-date format, YYYY-MM-DD

government_issued_id.description: Provide SSN in case of Customers from US.

email.description: This field contains the customer’s email address within the OrbiPay System.

phone_number.description: Home phone number of the customer

social_account_id.description: id provided by the social networking sites.

register_login_id.description: Email or phone number used for login.

400.description: The request was unacceptable, often due to missing a required parameter.

402.description: The request was unacceptable, often due to missing a required parameter.

500.description: Something went wrong at the Orbipay-Checkout Server

get.description: The Get Customer API is used to retrieve the details of the customer based on the id.

parameters.name: ID_CUSTOMER
parameters.description: Id of the customer issued by orbipay system.

parameters.name: PARTNER_ID
parameters.description: Unique partner Identifier, for example  cli_example5852kw555

parameters.name: SIGNATURE_KEY
parameters.description: Signature key used for authentication  cli_example5852kw555

put.description: The Update Customer API is used to edit the customer's personal details or the customer's status. Only the information being updated needs to be sent in the request, along with the id of the customer being updated.

parameters.name: customer
parameters.description: This JSON contains all the attributes of customer to be created.

id.description: Unique ID assigned by the Orbipay Wallet to the customer.

first_name.description: This field contains account holder’s first name and will be sent on all types of detail records.

last_name.description: This field contains the account holder’s last name, and will appear on all types of detail records.

phone_number.description: Home phone number of the customer

social_account_id.description: id provided by the social networking sites.

register_login_id.description: Email or phone number used for login.

post.description: This API is used to add a funding account for the customer. The funding account is available for servicing all the customer accounts the customer holds. An exhaustive set of account types are supported as funding accounts as indicated in the field account_subtype. ABA routing number is mandatory for bank accounts. Expiry date, address fields and Card CVV are required for card accounts.

parameters.name: ID_CUSTOMER
parameters.description: Id of the customer issued by orbipay system.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: This JSON contains all the attributes of Funding account to be added to customer.

id.description: Id is a unique identifier assigned to the account in OrbiPay-Checkout system.

customer_id.description: Unique ID assigned by the Orbipay Wallet to the customer.

aba_routing_number.description: ABA Routing Number is mandatory for Bank Accounts.

account_number.description: Account Number field is expected to be a unique field for the accounts in partner system.

currency_code3d.description: 3 character ISO currency code should be provided in currencyCode3d field default to USD.

account_subtype.description: 'Account Sub Type indicates the sub type of a funding account.'

parameters.name: PARTNER_ID
parameters.description: Unique partner Identifier, for example  cli_example5852kw555

parameters.name: SIGNATURE_KEY
parameters.description: Signature key used for authentication  cli_example5852kw555

200.description: Response to Create Customer API is populated with the External Identifiers issued by OrbiPay-Checkout system for the customer and the account(s).

id.description: Id is a unique identifier assigned to the account in OrbiPay-Checkout system.

customer_id.description: Unique ID assigned by the Orbipay Wallet to the customer.

aba_routing_number.description: ABA Routing Number is mandatory for Bank Accounts.

account_number.description: Account Number field is expected to be a unique field for the accounts in partner system.

currency_code3d.description: 3 character ISO currency code should be provided in currencyCode3d field default to USD.

account_subtype.description: 'Account Sub Type indicates the sub type of a funding account.'

402.description: The request was unacceptable, often due to missing a required parameter.

500.description: Something went wrong at the Orbipay-Checkout Server

post.description: This API is used to add a funding account for the customer. The funding account is available for servicing all the customer accounts the customer holds. An exhaustive set of account types are supported as funding accounts as indicated in the field account_subtype. ABA routing number is mandatory for bank accounts. Expiry date, address fields and Card CVV are required for card accounts.

parameters.name: ID_CUSTOMER
parameters.description: Id of the customer issued by orbipay system.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: This JSON contains all the attributes of Funding account to be added to customer.

id.description: Id is a unique identifier assigned to the account in OrbiPay-Checkout system.

card_number.description: Account Number field is expected to be a unique field for the accounts in partner system.

currency_code3d.description: 3 character ISO currency code should be provided in currencyCode3d field default to USD.

account_subtype.description: 'Account Sub Type indicates the sub type of a funding account.'

expiry_date.description: Expiry date of the account is of format mm/yy

card_cvv_number.description: Card CVV/CVV2 number is conditional and needs to be passed when adding or editing a Card as a funding account.

parameters.name: PARTNER_ID
parameters.description: Unique partner Identifier, for example  cli_example5852kw555

parameters.name: SIGNATURE_KEY
parameters.description: Signature key used for authentication  cli_example5852kw555

id.description: Id is a unique identifier assigned to the account in OrbiPay-Checkout system.

card_number.description: Account Number field is expected to be a unique field for the accounts in partner system.

currency_code3d.description: 3 character ISO currency code should be provided in currencyCode3d field default to USD.

account_subtype.description: 'Account Sub Type indicates the sub type of a funding account.'

expiry_date.description: Expiry date of the account is of format mm/yy

card_cvv_number.description: Card CVV/CVV2 number is conditional and needs to be passed when adding or editing a Card as a funding account.

post.description: Creates a wallet for the customer.

parameters.name: wallet
parameters.description: This JSON contains all the attributes of customer to be created.

id.description: Unique ID assigned by the Orbipay Wallet.

balance.description: The current balance of the wallet

allOf.description: All numeric with last 2 digits as decimal.

currency.description: The currency - should be ISO_4217 format.

customer_id.description: Unique ID assigned by the Orbipay Wallet to the customer.

parameters.name: PARTNER_ID
parameters.description: Unique partner Identifier, for example  cli_example5852kw555

parameters.name: SIGNATURE_KEY
parameters.description: Signature key used for authentication  cli_example5852kw555

parameters.name: CUSTOMER_ID
parameters.description: Unique partner Identifier, for example  cli_example5852kw555

post.description: This API is used to retrieve a list of funding accounts associated with a customer. The number of funding accounts retrieved can be modified using the initial_records request parameter. The ID_CUSTOMER  is issued by OrbiPay Checkout system.

parameters.name: ID_CUSTOMER
parameters.description: Id of the customer issued by orbipay system.

parameters.name: initial_records
parameters.description: initial count of records to be retrieved, for example 10

parameters.name: PARTNER_ID
parameters.description: Unique partner Identifier, for example  cli_example5852kw555

parameters.name: SIGNATURE_KEY
parameters.description: Signature key used for authentication  cli_example5852kw555

200.description: Response to Retrieve Customer's Funding Accounts API is populated with the list funding accounts of a customer.

id.description: Id is a unique identifier assigned to the account in OrbiPay-Checkout system.

customer_id.description: Unique ID assigned by the Orbipay Wallet to the customer.

aba_routing_number.description: ABA Routing Number is mandatory for Bank Accounts.

account_number.description: Account Number field is expected to be a unique field for the accounts in partner system.

currency_code3d.description: 3 character ISO currency code should be provided in currencyCode3d field default to USD.

account_subtype.description: 'Account Sub Type indicates the sub type of a funding account.'

total_results_count.description: total number of customers available with matching criteria

has_more_results.description: is true if there are more results or pages

query_id.description: used for retreiving previous and next pages

400.description: The request was unacceptable, often due to missing a required parameter.

402.description: The request was unacceptable, often due to missing a required parameter.

500.description: Something went wrong at the Orbipay-Checkout Server

get.description: This API is used to retrieve and display customer funding account information with pagination.

parameters.name: ID_CUSTOMER
parameters.description: Id of the customer issued by orbipay system.

parameters.name: query_id
parameters.description: query id of the result in the context, for example 15

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: starting id of the result in the context, for example 11

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: starting id of the result in the context, for example 20

parameters.name: PARTNER_ID
parameters.description: Unique partner Identifier, for example  cli_example5852kw555

parameters.name: SIGNATURE_KEY
parameters.description: Signature key used for authentication  cli_example5852kw555

200.description: Response to Get Customer's Funding Accounts API is populated with the list funding accounts of a customer for the query.

id.description: Id is a unique identifier assigned to the account in OrbiPay-Checkout system.

customer_id.description: Unique ID assigned by the Orbipay Wallet to the customer.

aba_routing_number.description: ABA Routing Number is mandatory for Bank Accounts.

account_number.description: Account Number field is expected to be a unique field for the accounts in partner system.

currency_code3d.description: 3 character ISO currency code should be provided in currencyCode3d field default to USD.

account_subtype.description: 'Account Sub Type indicates the sub type of a funding account.'

total_results_count.description: total number of customers available with matching criteria

has_more_results.description: is true if there are more results or pages

query_id.description: used for retreiving previous and next pages

402.description: The request was unacceptable, often due to missing a required parameter.

500.description: Something went wrong at the Orbipay-Checkout Server

parameters.name: CUSTOMER_ID
parameters.description: Unique partner Identifier, for example  cli_example5852kw555

delete.description: The Delete Funding Account API is used to delete the funding account of a customer. All pending payments made with that account are cancelled upon deletion of the funding account.

parameters.name: ID_ACCOUNT
parameters.description: Id of the Funding/Customer Account issued by orbipay system.

parameters.name: PARTNER_ID
parameters.description: Unique partner Identifier, for example  cli_example5852kw555

parameters.name: SIGNATURE_KEY
parameters.description: Signature key used for authentication  cli_example5852kw555

parameters.name: CUSTOMER_ID
parameters.description: Unique partner Identifier, for example  cli_example5852kw555

200.description: Response to Delete Funding Account API is populated with the deleted Funding Account.

id.description: Unique ID assigned by the Orbipay Wallet to the customer.

isDeleted.description: Unique ID assigned by the Orbipay Wallet to the customer.

400.description: The request was unacceptable, often due to missing a required parameter.

402.description: The request was unacceptable, often due to missing a required parameter.

500.description: Something went wrong at the Orbipay-Checkout Server

post.description: This API is used to retrieve a list of funding accounts associated with a customer. The number of cards retrieved can be modified using the initial_records request parameter. The ID_CUSTOMER  is issued by OrbiPay Checkout system.

parameters.description: Id of the customer issued by orbipay system.

parameters.description: initial count of records to be retrieved, for example 10

parameters.name: PARTNER_ID
parameters.description: Unique partner Identifier, for example  cli_example5852kw555

parameters.name: SIGNATURE_KEY
parameters.description: Signature key used for authentication  cli_example5852kw555

200.description: Response to Update Card API response is populated with the updated card.

id.description: Id is a unique identifier assigned to the account in OrbiPay-Checkout system.

card_number.description: Account Number field is expected to be a unique field for the accounts in partner system.

currency_code3d.description: 3 character ISO currency code should be provided in currencyCode3d field default to USD.

account_subtype.description: 'Account Sub Type indicates the sub type of a funding account.'

expiry_date.description: Expiry date of the account is of format mm/yy

card_cvv_number.description: Card CVV/CVV2 number is conditional and needs to be passed when adding or editing a Card as a funding account.

post.description: The Transfer money API is used to transfer money between wallet to wallet or non-wallet.

parameters.name: transfer
parameters.description: This JSON contains all the attributes of customer to be created.

id.description: Id is a unique identifier assigned to the account in OrbiPay-Checkout system.

transfer_type.description: w2w: wallet to wallet w2nw: wallet to non-wallet

amount.description: The current balance of the wallet

allOf.description: All numeric with last 2 digits as decimal.

currency.description: The currency - should be ISO_4217 format.

customer_id.description: Id is a unique identifier assigned to the account in OrbiPay-Checkout system.

receiver_customer_id.description: Id is a unique identifier assigned to the account in OrbiPay-Checkout system.

receiver_name.description: This field contains account holder’s first name and will be sent on all types of detail records.

receiver_email_id.description: This field contains the customer’s email address within the OrbiPay System.

receiver_phone_number.description: Home phone number of the customer

transfer_to_option.description: email: reference link will be sent to reciever's email phone: reference link will be sent to reciever's phone all: reference link will be sent to reciever's email and phone

parameters.name: PARTNER_ID
parameters.description: Unique partner Identifier, for example  cli_example5852kw555

parameters.name: SIGNATURE_KEY
parameters.description: Signature key used for authentication  cli_example5852kw555

parameters.name: CUSTOMER_ID
parameters.description: Unique partner Identifier, for example  cli_example5852kw555

post.description: This API is used to retrieve a list of funding accounts associated with a customer. The number of cards retrieved can be modified using the initial_records request parameter. The ID_CUSTOMER  is issued by OrbiPay Checkout system.

parameters.description: Id of the customer issued by orbipay system.

parameters.name: initial_records
parameters.description: initial count of records to be retrieved, for example 10

parameters.name: PARTNER_ID
parameters.description: Unique partner Identifier, for example  cli_example5852kw555

parameters.name: SIGNATURE_KEY
parameters.description: Signature key used for authentication  cli_example5852kw555

parameters.name: CUSTOMER_ID
parameters.description: Unique partner Identifier, for example  cli_example5852kw555

200.description: Response to Retrieve Customer's Cards API is populated with the list cards of a customer.

transaction_type.description: cashIn: load money in to the wallet cashIn: unaloda money from the wallet transfer: tranfer money from wallet to wallet or non-wallet

transaction_subtype.description: w2w: wallet to wallet transfer w2nw: wallet to non-wallet transfer

card_reference_id.description: Id is a unique identifier assigned to the card by Orbipay Wallet.

bank_account_reference_id.description: Id is a unique identifier assigned to the bank by Orbipay Wallet.

amount.description: The current balance of the wallet

allOf.description: All numeric with last 2 digits as decimal.

receiver_email_id.description: This field contains the customer’s email address within the OrbiPay System.

receiver_phone_number.description: Home phone number of the customer

transfer_to_option.description: email: reference link will be sent to reciever's email phone: reference link will be sent to reciever's phone all: reference link will be sent to reciever's email and phone

total_results_count.description: total number of customers available with matching criteria

has_more_results.description: is true if there are more results or pages

query_id.description: used for retreiving previous and next pages
